title: Rock Creek Park: While At The Park - Ranger Guided
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Education     Plan A Field Trip     Ranger Guided     While At The Park - Ranger Guided                  While At The Park      Trip TipsUtilize the park as an outdoor classroom! Each of these programs were created with curriculum matches in mind. Our recommended pre- and post- visit activities will further connect your students' learning objectives to their park experience.Easy-to-read name tags make the program more personal.Dress for the weather. Make sure all participants wear comfortable clothing and sturdy shoes. Note: programs are held in sun, rain, heat, and cold, so be prepared!
